data.name: Tater Spud
data.detailed_description:
Explore, fight, and platform through deadly plants and obstacles as a potato named Tater Spud. Interact with friendly flora and fauna to begin to learn what is causing the world to turn rotten.

Play as Tater Spud to gain powerful abilities and use collectables to upgrade your gear with the goal of defeating some of the nastiest plant-animals ever seen. Whether day or night there will be dangers to overcome (or die a lot from).

"Buy it Now!" — Murphy Mango (probably)


Features
  • Hidden Powerups
  • Collectable Tater Tots and Mushrooms
  • Upgradeable Weapons
  • Tough Bosses
  • Talking Plants & Animals (woah)
  • Free Updates
data.about_the_game:
Explore, fight, and platform through deadly plants and obstacles as a potato named Tater Spud. Interact with friendly flora and fauna to begin to learn what is causing the world to turn rotten.

Play as Tater Spud to gain powerful abilities and use collectables to upgrade your gear with the goal of defeating some of the nastiest plant-animals ever seen. Whether day or night there will be dangers to overcome (or die a lot from).

data.short_description: Explore, fight, and platform through a world of deadly plants as a lone potato, Tater Spud, in search of powerups and the answers behind the flora that was once safe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3500U (2.1 - 3.7 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 Mobile
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p at up to 60 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600H (3.3 - 4.2 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3050 Mobile
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4K at up to 120 FPS
